title: BenchLink: An SoC-Based Benchmark for Resilient Communication Links in GPS-Denied Environments
summary: Accurate timing and synchronization, typically enabled by GPS, are essential for modern wireless communication systems. However, many emerging applications must operate in GPS-denied environments where signals are unreliable or disrupted, resulting in oscillator drift and carrier frequency impairments.
